DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to measure the tissular oxygen saturation in brain by magnetic resonance imaging on subjects and to correlate the results with near infrared spectroscopy measurements.
DOC.brief_title: Magnetic Resonance Imaging Evaluation of the Tissular Oxygen Saturation in Brain
DOC.criteria: Healthy Volunteers or Patients with cerebral lesion claustrophobia MRI exclusion criteria
